full_summary:
# Notice of Tender

## Service Title: Technical and Engineering Support Services

## Solicitation Reference Number: 23-231370

## Closing Date and Time: **2023-06-21, 14:00:00**

## Brief Description
Global Affairs Canada, Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), requires technical and engineering support services to supplement its staff for better managing its mandate as the Technical Authority and engineering support for the Project Delivery, Professional and Technical Services Bureau (AWD).

## Service Requirements
The Engineering and Commissioning Services section of AWD conducts and manages engineering reviews for construction and maintenance projects, as well as commissioning (Cx) processes. In support of Treasury Board policy, DFATD also requires technical support in Mechanical and Electrical engineering disciplines to advance several projects.

## Key Characteristics

* Services are required on an “as and when needed” basis
* Level of effort will vary in accordance with AWD project needs
* May require increased or decreased effort based on changing priorities

## Evaluation Criteria
The winning bidder will be selected based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Awarding Authority
Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development, 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0G4

## Contact Information
Kingsley Knight, kinglseyknight.ohene-djan@international.gc.ca, (343) 548-1797

## Tender Documents
To obtain the tender notice and documents, visit: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6208/23-231370–npp—tsps—technical\-and\-engineering\-\-support\-\-services\-\(tess\-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6208/23-231370–npp—tsps—technical\-and\-engineering\-support \`-services\-\(tess\-en.pdf)
